articles.title: SpaceX Starship SN10 Completes Landing, Before Explosion - Chronicle
articles.description: SpaceX’s Starship SN10 prototype exploded shortly after landing at the company’s launch site in Boca Chica, Texas, on March 3. The spacecraft performed a successful six-minute test flight, including a launch and landing, prior to the explosion.…
